subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In the Saints’ 45-28 triumph, in which they set an N.F.L. playoff record with 626 yards and never punted the ball, even the defenses were offensive.
snippet: In the Saints’ 45-28 triumph, in which they set an N.F.L. playoff record with 626 yards and never punted the ball, even the defenses were offensive.
